alert.note: Alert for Nicholas; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 08 at 11:14AM EST until March 09 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Licking River at Blue Licks Spring affecting Robertson and Nicholas Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Licking River at Blue Licks Spring. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Cropland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 26.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM EST Tuesday was 27.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow and continue falling to 9.4 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 26.3 feet on 06/18/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued later today.
